t: Check out this Amazon review of Bodum 34 oz Brazil French Press Coffee Maker, High-Heat Borosilicate Glass, Black - Made in Portugal
s: The Ikea model worked well for a couple of years, but eventually the bottom filter bent out of shape and no longer filtered very well. This Bodum version was the same price (also $10) and looks and works similar to the Ikea version, but Bodum is superior in a few ways.

t: UPPHETTA French press coffee maker, glass/stainless steel, 1 l (34 oz) - IKEA CA

s: October 31, 2024 - I have reviewed the French Press ... from IKEA with one from the original maker, Bodum. I’d always wanted to try the iconic Chambord model but hadn’t felt the need, figuring a French Press is just a French Press. However, today I’ve noticed a discount on Bodum’s Java model at Lidl. The Java is essentially a matte black, mostly plastic version of the Chambord, and I thought it was a great opportunity to try out Bodum’s design at a discounted price. ... Bodum is a renowned brand in the world ...
